metadata.name: Sami the Samurai Squirrel: Welcome to Woodbriar
metadata.description: Action, Adventure and comedy await, as Sami the samurai squirrel and friends embark on a quest to solve a mystery that's been haunting the village of Woodbriar for years. A hooded ghost named Visper has been watching Sami from the shadows. Who is Visper? What does he want? Join the fun, as Sami encounters ninja monkeys, hungry pirates and a cranky Cyber-Yeti in this action-packed series from creator Scoot McMahon. Also featuring an exclusive story co-written by famous cartoonists Art Baltazar and Franco! Aw Yeah!
